channel.title: Associations on VitaminDWiki
channel.description: Recent content in Associations on VitaminDWiki

item.title: Zinc and Vitamin D
item.description:
It appears that

  • Low Zinc results in less vitamin D in blood getting to tissues

  • Colds can be stopped by taking Zinc every 2-3 hours

    • COVID-19 risks appear to decrease by taking Zinc frequently

  • Zinc improves the immune system and influences 300 enzymes

  • Zinc deficiency has increased due to lack of Zinc in fertilizers as well as Roundup problems

  • 20% of the people in the world do not get enough Zinc

item.title: Vitamin D Binding Protein
item.description:
• Vitamin D Binding Protein and Its Gene Polymorphisms —The Risk of Malignant Tumors and Other Diseases - Oct 2020
      • Low response to Vitamin D can be improved in many ways
      • See also web
      • Vitamin D Binding Protein mutations are not noticed by the Vitamin D Test – March 2024

Vitamin D Binding Protein and Its Gene Polymorphisms —The Risk of Malignant Tumors and Other Diseases - Oct 2020

PDF

item.title: Curcumin helps many health problems
item.description:
• Curcumin helps 9 health measures - umbrella meta-analysis June 2024
      • Curcumin, inflammation, and chronic diseases: how are they linked? May 2015
      • Natural Products for the Treatment of Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus July 2015
      • Curcumin: A Natural Product for Diabetes and its Complications - 2015
      • The beneficial role of curcumin on inflammation, diabetes and neurodegenerative disease: A recent update. Sept 2015
      • Efficacy of Turmeric as Adjuvant Therapy in Type 2 Diabetic Patients - April 2015
      • Role of Curcumin in Common Musculoskeletal Disorders: a Review of Current Laboratory, Translational, and Clinical Data - Aug 2015
      • Turmeric Extract 100% Effective At Preventing Type 2 Diabetes - Aug 2013
      • Curcumin at GreenMedInfo
      • Curcumin and diabetes: a role for the vitamin D receptor? - Dec 2012
      • Alzheimer’s,vitamin D3 and curcumin - March 2012
      • Recent Developments in Delivery, Bioavailability, Absorption and Metabolism of Curcumin - 2014
      • Curcumin Extract for Prevention of Type 2 Diabetes - 2012
      • Nanotechnology-Applied Curcumin for Different Diseases Therapy - 2014
      • Diabetes associated with low vitamin D in virtually every study, but want more studies – July 2015
      • See also web
      • Curcumin and Depression

Curcumin helps 9 health measures - umbrella meta-analysis June 2024

Prostaglandins Other Lipid Mediat 2024 Jun 28:174:106867. doi: 10.1016/j.prostaglandins.2024.106867

  • Excellent reviews of supplements at ConsumerLab

  • Previous Review: Supplement reviews by ConsumerLab – Vitamin D, Magnesium, Vitamin K, Calcium , Boron – Nov 2019

item.title: Cystic Fibrosis
item.description:
• Cystic fibrosis (CF) is a genetic disorder that affects the lungs, pancreas, and other organs, leading to severe respiratory and digestive problems.

  • 162,428 people are living with CF around the world.

  • 105,352 (65%) have been diagnosed

  • 57,076 individuals undiagnosed (Summary by Perplexity AI - March 2024)

      • Oral vitamin D helps cystic fibrosis - meta-analysis Jan 2024
      • CF treated by Vitamins D, A, C, E, and zinc, omega-3 (DHA), garlic, ginseng and curcumin - Mercola May 2024
      • Cystic Fibrosis treatment Trikafta costs $300,000/year - March 2024
      • Google Scholar had 371 studies with CF and Vitamin D in their title as of March 2025
      • See also WikiPedia
      • UK Cystic Fibrosis recommendations to be released in 2017
      • Average annual cost of CF = $16,000 (March 2013)
      • Role of vitamin D on gut microbiota in cystic fibrosis - 2018
      • CF results in pancreatic insufficiency-induced malabsorption - which reduces the response to standard Vitamin D - Jan 2021

Oral vitamin D helps cystic fibrosis - meta-analysis Jan 2024

Vitamin D deficiency in patients with cystic fibrosis: a systematic review and meta-analysis

item.title: Falls and Fractures
item.description:
20% of women will get a hip fracture in their lives

Estimation of the lifetime risk of hip fracture for women and men in Canada March 2012 FREE PDF doi: 10.1007/s00198-011-1652-8

Predict 30 day Hip fracture mortality – the only controllable variable is Vitamin D – Sept 2023

Emergency department prediction model for 30-day mortality after hip fracture: the Spanish National Hip Fracture Registry (RNFC) cohort

Hip Int . 2023 Sep 5;doi: 10.1177/11207000231197818

item.title: Trauma and surgery
item.description:
• High Dose Vitamin D in the (COVID) ICU - video May 2023

High Dose Vitamin D in the (COVID) ICU - video May 2023

Dr. Eduardo Beltran

In this video, we shall talk about HLD (600K IU of vitamin D3) that was used in the intensive care unit (Brazil & Bolivia) used in patients who were diagnosed with SCV-2. Patients received their D3 via an NG tube while being intubated and connected to a ventilator. 26 out of 28 patients survived. The results speak for themselves.
